messages.body: And I'm Mboi, God of Waterways!
messages.speaker: Mom

messages.body: I feel like it becomes harder and harder to become stronger...
messages.speaker: You

messages.body: I feel like I've seen that name before...
messages.speaker: You

messages.body: You wanna become stronger? Heh. Sometimes you gotta lose it all to reach a new height.
messages.speaker: Cid

messages.body: Anyways, take this. It teaches you how to Soul Crush.
messages.speaker: Cid

messages.body: He hands you an old scroll.
I shouldn't really take things from strangers...
messages.speaker: You

messages.body: But oh well. I'll take a shot. Hope it doesn't get me killed.
messages.speaker: You

messages.body: You may not be able to do it now, but someday... Good luck, kid.
messages.speaker: Cid
